thread.title: Europa League: Ebenezer Assifuah eyes Liverpool scalp at Anfield with FC Sion
thread.title_full: Europa League: Ebenezer Assifuah eyes Liverpool scalp at Anfield with FC Sion

title: Europa League: Ebenezer Assifuah eyes Liverpool scalp at Anfield with FC Sion
text:
Sports News | 1 October 2015 09:55 CET Europa League: Ebenezer Assifuah eyes Liverpool scalp at Anfield with FC Sion - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ebenezer Assifuah 
FC Sion striker Ebenezer Assifuah has predicted victory for his side at Liverpool in Thursday's Europa League Group B clash. 
The 22-year-old believes Sunday's Swiss Super League 1-0 home defeat to Vaduz at home has been a rude awakening for his side ahead of the trip to Anfield. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
